p: The viability of cells was determined by MTT assay after incubation with LPS and medicinal plant extracts for 24 hrs. MTT solution (5 mg/ml in PBS) was added to 96-well plates (plate 1) and incubated for 2 hrs, and then the supernatant was discarded. A solution of 0.04 M HCl in isopropanol was added to dissolve formazans formed in the cells and the absorbance measured at 570 nm [ 19]. The plant extract that showed viability of cell less than 70% was further diluted until 70% or higher viability was obtained, and its IC 50 value was calculated.
